system.description:
Makeshift armor plating with jagged, serrated edges. Like primal plate, but more hazardous to those who would do the robot ill, as the sharp protrusions can lead to injury.

Special: When a melee attack is made against a location fitted with serrated plate, and the attacker suffers a complication, then the attacker suffers 2 @fos[DC] Persistent (Physical) damage. In addition, melee attacks made using arms fitted with serrated plate gain the Persistent (Physical) damage effect.
